synopsis.text:
They say, in the realm above the clouds, a mythical phoenix safeguards the world from an icy doom. When the Sage of the Garden of Clouds misplaces the precious phoenix egg on his journey to meet the Queen of the Garden of Light, it tumbles into the vibrant Garden of Rainbows. Enter Hikari, an adventurous spirit on a skiing getaway, who stumbles upon the mysterious egg and witnesses the birth of a remarkable bird she affectionately names Hinata.

As Hinata's warmth illuminates their lives, the Sage and his companion, Muta, embark on a quest to recover the lost phoenix. Meanwhile, sinister forces lurk in the shadows, as two powerful minions of the Dark Lord, Frozen and Freezen, seek to capture the phoenix and plunge the world into an eternal winter.

In this thrilling standalone adventure set amidst the enchanting world of Futari Wa Pretty Cure Max Heart, the unbreakable bond between friends Nagisa and Honoka faces its greatest test. As they're pitted against each other, the Pretty Cure warriors must rise above their differences and unite to save Hinata, restoring harmony to the world. Will they triumph over the icy grip of darkness and rekindle the warmth of friendship? Join them on this magical journey and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
